application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of a written scheme of Archaeological investigation (WSI) pursuant to condition 51 of Planning Permission ref. 223203FUL dated 31.01.2023 for; Construction of three  buildings, ranging in height from 4 to 20 storeys, to provide 188 mixed tenure residential units (Use Class C3) and ground floor community space (Use Class F2(b)); construction of a new one-way access road, new undercroft car park and landscaped podium to the car park; other landscape and public realm works; surface parking to accommodate existing car parking and blue badge parking and all other associated infrastructure works. (Regulation 3 Application by London Borough of Ealing)
